page.title: 08Old People in Wantage (2)
page.content:
The Vale of the White Horse District provides sheltered units all connected to a warden. 1.Maude House has 29 flats and also a common room and a launderette.
2.Stirlings Close has 21 bungalows of varying size--bedsitters to 2 bedrooms.
3.Three Pigeons Close has 16 one bedroomed flats.
4.Maryfield has 32 flats with one or two bedrooms and 3 bungalows.
5.Partridge Close has 19 bungalows.
There is a waiting list of more than 500 for these units which allow people t remain independent for longer.
